website_summaries.verdict: When comfort and support count, count on the Pedic Walker. They're not as attractive as other models, but they are built for some of the most problematic feet.
pros: Provide welcome relief for customers with toe problems that require open-toed shoes
Straps allow adjustment when feet are swollen
Comes in black or dusty taupe nubuck
cons: Hook-and-loop closure needs to go further down the strap to accommodate heavy swelling

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 91 year old mother. She must wear an open toed shoe but we were having a difficult time finding one that would give her the support and stability she requires. This shoe gives her both and we are very happy with how well it is constructed. The shoe is a little heavier because it is so well constructed but she is learning to adjust to the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE SANDAL
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these sandals. They suit me in every way - comfortable, practical, good balance, support. They're not curtest or daintiest type one could buy, but I am a senior citizen and I was looking for relief from foot pain and having my toes closed in all the time. I love the velcro straps, which make them easy to put on and take off. The style is a somewhat like ancient Roman sandals, but they're comfortable and sturdy, great for everyday wear, doing errands, etc. That's all I care about.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Martha

customer_reviews.title: This is a well made shoe, but was just ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made shoe, but was just too heavy for my feet and not enough cushioning. Also not a lot of flexibility. I have neuropathy & foot drop. Kept it for a while but eventually gave them away. Wish I'd returned while I was still able. Only wore about 3 times around the house. Costly error on my part.
customer_reviews.author: LVGal

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals because I severely fractured my ankle, which led to extreme pronation. My orthodics fit perfectly inside. The leather is so soft I hardly know I'm wearing anything on my feet. I'm also a Diabetic who needs shoes made of soft materials. These are, by far, the best sandals I've ever worn. I can't say enough how pleased I am with these sandals. I just wish they came in a few different colors like navy blue and white.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Great for problem feet
customer_reviews.text: I am in my 70's with multiple foot problems. Sandals are helpful if they can leave my mis-shaped toes free, and these do. These also allow me to adjust the straps when my feet swell. I like the enclosed heels since they feel secure and look more dressy. I've bought other Propet shoes from Amazon for several years and have never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Needs stronger velcro
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 10B shoe. I tried the 10B sandal and it was too big. The 9.5B is still a tiny bit large, but I think the 9B would bit too small, so I kept the 9.5B. As other reviewers have mentioned, the velcro closure seems a weak and it seems like after a while, I'll have to have the velcro replaced with stronger velcro, but I like the sandals, so I kept them.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found these shoes (saw pair on sale-closeout item, wrong size - looked up on internet) - from that I ordered these. seem to be good and feels almost like "barefoot"..not heavy, my feet can't take pressure of most shoes (swell), I think these will work fine. first pair I ordered 9.5, the velcro straps had to be adjusted at shoe repair -- didn't want to wait for exchange (seller offered)...ordered second pair 8.5 after finding similar locally and trying on...8.5 was better fit, my right foot swells a little, so sometimes will wear the right shoe from the 9.5 size (exactly same style/color).
customer_reviews.author: Karen  Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Fit will and easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: these shoes look very nice. I bought them for my dementia wife so ease of putting on and taking them off is important to me and her care givers. Since she is non-verbal it hard to know if the shoes are too small or to large so the open toe concept is prefect in that situation. I ordered two of the exact shoes in black close to two years ago and been using one of them all this time. The shoe are durable and will built.
customer_reviews.author: Loutfy

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal, but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I don't own any other Propet shoes, but normally I wear an 8 1/2 C/D. I ordered the first pair in that size and they were too small in length and in width. This is barely long enough, but leather usually stretches over time so I didn't want it longer. So these shoes run small. I suggest ordering a half size up for length and wider width than you normally wear. Once you find the right fit, these sandals are exceptionally comfortable. I had inserts in my Brook's Addiction tie shoes, but don't need them in these sandals. Very comfortable and definitely worth the money. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. K. Mikan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walking sandal with much support
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this Pedic Walker. My previous pair lasted for about 4-years and I used them a lot, especially on vacation when I needed a sturdy walking shoe. There is not a great deal of flexibiity with these shoes, which is why I like them. Most sandals are flimsy and flex quite a bit while walking, which hurts my feet. The Pedic Walker reminds me more of the support that is afforded by a laced shoe. Overall, one of the best walking shoes I've ever owned. I'd highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Dailey

customer_reviews.title: " leather " strap was bleeding dye onto my white socks.  not worth the $ I paid.  Return time period has passed.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased earlier this year in anticipation of summer sandal season. However, Left a black mark on every pair of socks I wore. The " leather " strap was bleeding dye onto my white socks. May be counterfeit knock off, like the kind sold on the sidewalks of New York City by the street vendors. ≈
customer_reviews.author: Pribbaun

customer_reviews.title: A great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I bout these sandals for my 92 year old mom. She lives near me in Florida. These sandals are perfect for her. They offer a wide platform and full heel support. This was very important to her as I have read that elderly people have the second most falls wearing sandals. She says they are very comfortable and she loves the look of them. Moreover, the neutral color makes them perfect to wear with any thing. This is a great quality product by Propet.
customer_reviews.author: M H B

customer_reviews.title: You don't get quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Propet shoe I've tried and I'm disappointed every time. No matter what might be right with the shoe, they are too short, and I order my normal size (or 1 size up in whole sizes). My toes run up against the front toe area every time. The width isn't right and the velcro closures are too short. In my opinion the shoe just isn't quality and it doesn't function as described.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D in TN

customer_reviews.title: Poorly thought out
customer_reviews.text: Big problem is small velcro tabs that make them unusable. It has a large strap across top of shoe but the small tabs make them lucky to work for you. You would think ortho shoes made for diabetic feet would be adjustable. Probably good idea to stay away from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lasham

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and rubs the back of my heel; poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is not comfortable and seems poorly made. The back part of the shoe rubbed my heel area. I removed the original insert and put my own in. It fit reasonably well in the shoe, but the shoe was a little short.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQzzz

customer_reviews.title: heel
customer_reviews.text: the heel is higher than most sandals I have had and i find it rubs my achilles more than I like. The shoe is well made and appropriate for those with foot issues. It's just difficult to find a shoe that fits well when you can't try it on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need.
customer_reviews.text: I agree with those who think these look like cheap knock-offs-that's why only 4 stars. But i wear a heel lift in my left shoe and an orthotic in my right shoe and the only other sandal i have found that can handle these are about $150. If you wear orthotics, these are worth a try. If not, there are better choices.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Loved them but
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes and wore them all the time unfortunately the placement of the ridges in the sole below the toes caused a chronic pain situation to the joint below my big and second toe. I would love the same shoe without the ridges. Very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Star Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Then I realized that such an extra-sturdy sandal would be a cool (temperature wise) summer alternative to my usual walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I'd have to return these, as they are much heavier than I expected. I knew I'd have to order at least a half-size up with this manufacturer, so that worked out, it's just the heaviness that worried me. Then I realized that such an extra-sturdy sandal would be a cool (temperature wise) summer alternative to my usual walking shoes, and decided to keep them for that purpose. I would have liked them better if they'd had a black leather footbed instead of a gray sueded one-- much more practical, and also hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: C Friedrich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Again, the friend I bought these for likes them very much. She likes the ease in which she can put them on and the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffreylee10

customer_reviews.title: My aunt is very happy with these and says they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my Aunt who has severe edema in her legs and feet. I found them by looking for "shoes for swollen feet". Although she had diabetic shoes, she never wore them because they were heavy clunky and ugly. My aunt is very happy with these and says they are very comfortable. The velcro closures are a real help to her since she also has arthritis and other issues. The biggest plus is that they are not UGLY
customer_reviews.author: Khamedora

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit perfectly and are sooooo comfortable! I wanted a sandal for spring
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually order shoes on line, but took a chance. These shoes fit perfectly and are sooooo comfortable! I wanted a sandal for spring, but needed heel control as I have little to no feeling in my feet and my heels tend to slip off with conventional sandals causing me to fall. These sandals do the job nicely. No slippage, great fit - I couldn't be happier! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Pat Smith

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were so great, I need comfortable shoes and I was so hopeful about these. I don't think I have difficult feet, but the straps were too far back, and cut into my ankles. They are on their way back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Newbuck is softer and comfortable; black is Too stiff and fit too short in lenght
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black. Too Short - 8 and 8 1/2 too small; would have needed 9. Leather is too stiff as well. That is the main reason I didn't try the size 9. Too bad they don't come in softer leather or black nubuck.. 5/17 - revised review - this is for the dusty newbuck which is more comfortable and fits better in my size 8 foot. Again still wishing for black newbuck sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Ishop

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my mom as she has wide feet and is super hard to find anything that looks nice and feels comfortable. True to size
customer_reviews.author: joleen rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great sandle, ugly colors.
customer_reviews.text: I love this style shoe. Allows me to wear my orthodic inserts without slipping around. Sorry you do not have other colors about 18 years ago this style was available in brown and blue. Brown and blue were absolutely beautiful colors, I always received compliments. The only colors available now is what I call "disgusting medical beige" & black.
customer_reviews.author: elavern

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these.  Have several colors. All I wear in Florida
customer_reviews.text: I require orthopedic inserts in my shoes, and this fits my Lynco insert perfectly. I bought a pair 5 years ago and wore them constantly in Florida practically year round. I them bought it in other colors for church. My old pair of these finally wore out after being drenched in a rain storm so I replace them EXACTLY.
customer_reviews.author: ClaireS

customer_reviews.title: too stiff
customer_reviews.text: I could not walk in these shoes and it took me a while to figure out that the reason is they aren't at all flexible, so it's like walking in wooden clogs which made me feel off-balance. The insole has a terrible bump that hits in the middle of your heel. It is a nice leather but I couldn't wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Another opinion

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable walking sandal.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to walk and the insole is deep and soft which helps to relieve my diabetic foot aches during my long walks. I usually buy 7.5 wide in shoes and sneakers and they fit snugly but this sandal is wider than usual in the front part even after I adjust the Velcro as tight as possible. Hence the 4 stars instead of 5. Otherwise it is a great walker sandal. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: vasantha

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shoes makes for one Very Happy Mom!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a gift to my mother and she was pleasantly surprised when we gave her this gift on Mother's Day. She had an old pair of the exact same shoe which she swore she couldn't live without. This pair fits PERFECTLY! She took them out of the box and onto her feet they went. She states they are the most comfortable shoes she's ever worn. They are quality through and through!
customer_reviews.author: Ms67GTO

customer_reviews.title: Okay but didn’t work for my feet
customer_reviews.text: The straps didn’t come together on top. The one strap by my toes was fine.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Great support for mobility issues!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mother-in-law because she's blind and needs better support of her heels. She has hammertoes and needs the toe box open. She loves these, and has had many less episodes of losing her balance. These shoes provide the much needed heel support, where traditional sandals were allowing her heel to slide off the shoe bed, nearly tripping her up. We are ordering a color for Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knock-Offs
customer_reviews.text: these shoes must be the knock offs we hear about on the news. They have absolutely no stability which you expect and usually receive with this sandal. The footbed is squishy and offers no support whatsoever. Very disappointing. Don't buy Propet shoes from Amazon - they are not the quality you are used to with Propet. Buy only from authorized dealers.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Narrower Than Other Propet Styles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mother to replace another Propet style that had worn out. Though I bought the same size she has always worn (8M), it was too narrow and hurt her feet. Had to return and order size 8W.
customer_reviews.author: Polychrome

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes, BUT WAY Too Short
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are attractive and appear well made, but the reviewers are right. The shoes were at least one size too small (and I ordered my usual size 11, which was the longest offered) and the right foot was too narrow - the velcro wouldn't hold. I have worn other Propet shoes with no problem, but these were way too short. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Fan of Cozy Mysteries

customer_reviews.title: ... these sandals because they are solid and safe with great arch support
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second pair of these sandals because they are solid and safe with great arch support. Although a bit bulkier than your average sandal they are worth trading the bulk for a safe comfortable shoe that they are.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Velcro straps too short
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits well, but the Velcro straps seem too short. When I adjust them to a comfortable fit, about half the Velcro shows. I have 5 other pairs of Propet sandals and none of them have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Connie F

customer_reviews.title: Everyday and sandy beach wear sandal
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the feel of the sandal and especially like the covered heel area and the adjustable Velcro straps. The are heavier then some sandals but iI need stability with a previous ankle injury.
customer_reviews.author: lakegirl

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Substitute
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is so inferior to those of the past .The construction is not the same. The upper front is no longer leather but fabric,the leather fastening strap is thin and after three short wearings the leather is tearing.!I had to order a half size smaller because the shoe is longer.Also the inner sole is less well constructed and the entire fit is “off”.I have been wearing this propet sandle exclusively over the past five years and have multiple pairs .Even the older ones are still remarkably sturdy.I am afraid that this “new substitute “” will not meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for this hard to fit customer.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these .5 size too large. My own fault. They are super comfy, this praise comes from someone who cannot wear any shoe over 2" high, wears and orthopedic arch support in all her shoes, and suffers from restless leg syndrome, occasional bouts of planters fasciitis, and flat feet. And very wide feet 4E or WW. If you experience such problems give these a try . I can only imagine with these being so comfy with all of my foot problems that for someone without foot problems would find these shoes like walking on a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: bas bleu

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes for a 97-Year Old Great Grand Mother!
customer_reviews.text: We really liked these shoes for my mom! The support at the heel is great and the velcro ties are super adjustable. The open toe is great for a breathing effect on her toes which have been cured from fungi. They have been a great support for this still-walking-lady.
customer_reviews.author: Patci Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Second pair
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect for me I am in my eightys.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for walking.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my elderly mother. She says they are comfortable for walking. She likes the Velcro strap that she can adjust if her feet swell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're well made, but the velcro on the straps doesn't cover the inside of the whole strap.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these shoes. My mother has diabetes and her feet are swollen most days, so I thought that they would work. They did not. The velcro doesn't cover the entirety of the inner straps, which would have made these a winner. The shoes are well made, but would not fit around the tops of my mom's feet or ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I really like these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear an ankle/foot orthotic on my right foot. These sandals give me the support I need. They are much better than having to wear an enclosed shoe in the summer. Propet is a wonderful brand, they last long, and are not as expensive as other brands that have the same support. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DJW

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and supportive
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought these I didn't like them, I put them in the closet. But when I had foot surgery they were a God-send
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Reisinger

customer_reviews.title: Good, stable sandle
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes as I can walk in them safely. I have a weak ankle and need a shoe that gives me more stability. The sole is also more solid and I also need that. I can wear these all day and know I can run all my errands safely, comfortably and without any pain. Yes, I wish I could wear a slingy pretty sandle, but I cannot. I have a narrow foot and have a hard time finding a shoe that fits properly. The velcro straps on the medium width allow the shoe to fit even my narrow feet. I think the black leather sandle looks good with dress slacks for work.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: ....wonderful feel and look. As I need open-toed all year long, these will be my fall/winter shoes with socks. The heel of the shoe doesn't look so good with shorts or capris. I'll buy other black sandals for summer wear. Price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Freddi Scharf

customer_reviews.title: I had such high hopes and am utterly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the size 10 pair, because they were too small. The next size i 11, which is too big. There is something wrong with the construction of the heel part of the upper shoe. The back angles far more than expected, leaving an empty space, which makes the foot slip out of the shoe. I had such high hopes and am utterly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Buechernarr

customer_reviews.title: comfortable supportive sandal
customer_reviews.text: Provides comfort and support because it has a strong back. Purchased for someone who had a stroke, and she has worn this style sandal since then.
customer_reviews.author: ICBB Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black because they were the only color on sale. I have been wearing this style of shoe for years and have them in every color' Because of my foot problem I need an open toe shoe but I need the closed heel also because I have a balance problem and in the open heel sandals my heel may fall out and cause me to fall. The adjustable velcro straps make it possible to adjust them to fit whether I wear heavy socks or go barefoot. I really need another pair in tan but I am waiting until that color is on sale. When that happens I hope Amazon will let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome orthopedic sandals
customer_reviews.text: About the shoes for my mom and well she doesn’t use of the few times that I’ve tried them on they immediately change the posture in my back
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent option for women with severe cases of crossed over toes and bunions.
customer_reviews.text: My mom has a severe case of crossed over toes and bunions to the point that it's impossible for her to wear regular shoes, Shoes that are too wide still won't fit because the back of her heels slip out. With this shoes, I'm able to open the straps, lay the foot in then securely tighten the straps for a secure fit. Thanks to Propet, my mother is able to safely walk again. We liked it so much we got her a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Great option for women with feet issues.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for the second time, for a diabetic relative, who absolutely love them. She states they are very comfortable to walk with during extended periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: beautiful color. Get many compliments. Easy to get on and off. I have it 4 starts because straps should be a little bit longer so sad to fit better on wider feet.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Garcia

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals two years ago and they have stood the test of time. I wear them every day. My second pair, which I bought two weeks ago, fit just like the old ones. They give good support when I walk and are padded for softness. The best part of buying them from Amazon is that they are $30 cheaper than from Famous Footwear. One caution, you may want to use some form of Odor Eaters because the removable insole does not neutralize foot odor. Washing the insole does not help.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My mother has to wear shoes that she can wear her prescription inserts in. These shoes are very expensive at foot stores. I was thrilled to find these on line for 1/4 less than she has paid. They are the exact shoe!!
customer_reviews.author: DMS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These sandals were just what my problem feet needed. They are also easy to put on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Velcro Straps on 2E seem to be the same length ...
customer_reviews.text: Velcro Straps on 2E seem to be the same length as 4E. My left foot is constantly swollen after many foot surgeries so I thought the 4E straps would be longer. I chose "somewhat small" due to strap length. I have 3 pair of these - tan, denim and black.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja M.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Have had two previous pair of these sandals and they were great. Now however they seem to be cheaply made, and offer poor support. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I always have a pair on hand although with propet the sizing could be off
customer_reviews.author: B. Ratnoff

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sandals ever. Walk many miles with them and they last; hold their shape. My Number One shoe! Size is perfect. Like walking on sponges.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K.

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: My mother has swollen feet. The shoes seem to fit fine. Could use a little more length to straps bu they reach Velcro 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to meet my summer shoe needs! Well made, comfortable and a great walking shoe! It's easy to adjust the Velcro straps for a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: heddahopper43

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Came very quickly and was just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: A DeHart

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for people who are on their feet a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this brand of shoes for many years. They give great support to my feet, and my orthopedic inserts fit comfortably since the straps are easily adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Sarrah

customer_reviews.title: A good sandal for dress.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sandal for dress/casual dress. I wear them to church. I love the full heel which will never wear out because of driving the car, like a single heel strap can do. Actually, my favorite sandal is the Propet Ortho Walker III. I find Propet runs a bit small. Some shoes I can wear a 10 but these I need an 11. Big feet? No, just old feet that are expanding. I recommend these for the style, but the Ortho Walker III is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Dawn

customer_reviews.title: A dream for orthotics-wearers.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of these sandals that I have purchased. If you wear orthotics, these are PERFECT. They're not glamorous, but for everyday utilitarian shoes, they fill the bill. Adjustable, no laces, easy-peasy. Also good for people who want to keep their heels nice and not all dried out during sandal season.
customer_reviews.author: Ringlet13

customer_reviews.title: walking comfort
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find wide width sandals so I liked this brand so gave them another try and like them very much. I had toe surgery on my left foot and have to wear a surgical boot so haven't been able to wear both shoes walking. My right foot loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn the librarian

customer_reviews.title: Good support and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they are the only sandals that I buy and I recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: They're very comfy.
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves these sandals. They were her Christmas gift. She has very complicated feet and is hard to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: No more Propet's for me.
customer_reviews.text: For orthopedic shoes, these are one of the most uncomfortable shoes I've ever tried. Really hard, with sharp edges. No older person could be expected to break these in. This is the third pair of Propet's I've tried now and I'm done with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Aristotle Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but no longer made in my size
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of size 6 D that I've worn comfortably for 6 years all summer and LOVE. There is no longer a D in size 6 or 6.5 so I ordered a 6.5 B thinking size might make up for width. Too narrow / small - I had to return them. I am really frustrated that these sandals no longer seem to be available in a size I can wear. Why do companies do this?!?
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Corners Road

customer_reviews.title: Great, Supportive, Attractive Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Great Sandals. Good support and firm closure. It gives me a little height without hurting my recently operated on knee. I have them in black and really love both of them. I could wear them every day. They also look nice with dressier clothes...though I mainly wear them with casual clothing. Really great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe Company!
customer_reviews.text: Propet brand are one of the only shoe companies that make shoes that fit me & are comfortable. (I have many foot problems)
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S. Field

customer_reviews.title: The Propet Women's Pedic Walker sandal is very comfortable. I have trouble with my toes and was ...
customer_reviews.text: The Propet Women's Pedic Walker sandal is very comfortable. I have trouble with my toes and was looking for a shoe I could wear comfortable. These filled the bill. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: The shoes have a sturdy heel, the velcro closes over my swollen foot. The open toe box allows my numb toes to lie straight and still give me stability when I walk. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Bookfiend

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these shoes for my mother who is an ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for my mother who is an amputee. Her foot is an extra-extra large and the shoe(s) were too small for the width of her foot,
customer_reviews.author: Sheljoe

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to know if I can return these shoes and if so, how. No information was given.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Grreat sandal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sandal. It is ajustable easily and because insole is removable you can add arch support or orthotic. This closed heel gives better support and stability to ankle and foot. I have a very wide foot and ordered the double wide width, but though wide enough, it does not leave me much room to expand if my feet swell without showing the velcro fastening. So far shoes are very comfortable. EKT
customer_reviews.author: ECKT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for walking
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable right out of the box. My podiatrist recommended them for wearing with orthotics, and they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Conover

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my grandmother and she loves them. Says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MissA

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is a perfect fit and I love it that they are true ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is a perfect fit and I love it that they are true to size. I was able to put them on and they just fit without having to break in. Love them I would suggest them to anyone that needs a extra wide shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lula Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't wear.
customer_reviews.text: Did not meet my Propet expectations. Little to bulky. I have worn a similar pair with my orthotics inside. These were uncomfortable. I did return these but have not received credit to my account as of yet. I have inquired but still no satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this shoe two days ago and I love the looks. I can wear it for casual wear but I believe it will also look very good with dresses, skirts. Plan to wear them on Easter Sunday for Church and Brunch.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean Rebane

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many shoes from Propet. This style fits well and seems to be like the old ones I have worn out. Would recommedt to others.
customer_reviews.author: julien

customer_reviews.title: and she's so comfortable wearing them that I ordered a 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my elderly mother who had foot surgery and she has trouble wearing closed toe shoes. They fit her well; her foot is stable and secure; and she's so comfortable wearing them that I ordered a 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: JOT19

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Finally I got right shoes for my Mother. Sandals support foot very good. Its fit as expected. Delivery was on next day.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: If you need support and good looks this is the shoe to have.
customer_reviews.text: i have been wearing this Propet shoe for years now and they give the best support for me and especially since i have developed a numbness and weakness in my left leg.i feel confident walking in them. The last pair is 2 years old and would still be ok xcept i scuffed them-so i will wear the old ones"around the house" and the new ones to go out.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Very happy and expectations met!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for mom and very difficult to find comfort for and older person with orthodic needs...this sandal is great! Comfortable, attractive and stylish. If there was anything we need to adjust it was that they are a bit low in the heal so we put in dr scholl's gel heal cushions and that was the perfect remedy. .would recommend these for sure..
customer_reviews.author: TBK

customer_reviews.title: Supportive Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I have these in black, so now I have 2 pair which should hold up for a while. This is a supportive sandal and with my orthotics it will be a comfy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: They are the bomb! They provide excellent support, great breathing room for my feet and the padding doesn't make your feet tired or leave that dirty icky outside element type of residue that you get from other sandals. Nice pair of sandals and highly prefer these for my sensitive feet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lou

customer_reviews.title: Not the fit for my mother!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my elderly mother who is diabetic with troublesome toes. Due to edema the strap wouldn't even come close to closing. I tried the shoe on (50 something healthy woman) and liked the shoe but was not impressed with the arch support. It would be okay if you're not wearing it for any extended period of walking. Construction seemed very good. Leather's always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: JinglingJo

customer_reviews.title: This is my mother's second pair of these shoes. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my mother's second pair of these shoes. She likes sandals and these give her a little more stability. She is 89.
customer_reviews.author: dato

customer_reviews.title: These are the best sandal style shoe to wear with orthotic inserts
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sandal style shoe to wear with orthotic inserts. Have been wearing this style for years and always purchase another pair each spring. I wear them every day. I also have them in black and brown. Propet used to make this style in white leather and in bone smooth leather. I wish they still did as I would purchase them immediately. They are very comfortable and still look cute with casual spring and summer clothing. If you have to wear orthotic inserts, these are the sandals to buy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Creamer

customer_reviews.title: They worked for me. No more sweaty feet.
customer_reviews.text: I have metatarsalgia, Morton's neuroma and wide feet, and I wear orthotics. These sandals are the only ones I can wear for a few hours without pain. I've tried several others (pricey ones) without success. These have removable insoles which I really appreciate. I just don't understand why more manufacturers, including Propet, don't make more sandal styles with the ability to remove the insole. There must be millions of people who would love to wear sandals but can't because they wear orthotics. That said, give these a try if you have problem feet. They work for me. I'm buying more of these in case they stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: MIE

customer_reviews.title: but the several times I've worn them they were very comfortable. The fit is good
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these sandals/shoes for less than a week, but the several times I've worn them they were very comfortable. The fit is good, the arch support lets me wear them without my custom made orthotics, and for semi orthopedic shoes, they look very stylish. I will probably order Propet shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Supportive comfort shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes! Great combination of a supportive sneaker and sandal. I like being able to take the insole out and replace with my own orthodic.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: it is a sandal and I wear them a lot. they fit good
customer_reviews.author: Linda Henley

customer_reviews.title: The quality of sandals is poor
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprise when I saw the sandals. I was in shock for the material. What you paid for is not what you get. I definitely returned them. This is an overprice product for me. It is my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Propet Women's W0089 Pedic Walker Sandal
product_meta.description:
The Propet Pedic Walker sandal will ensure that your feet are ultra-comfortable--and that you look great. It features a leather upper with dual hook-and-loop straps, a closed back, and an open toe. It's engineered for superior comfort, with an extra-volume construction for a relaxed fit and a padded collar. An extended heel counter provides all-day support, while the removable Poliyou air insole provides cushioning, along with moisture- and odor-absorption. The EVA orthotic is removable for customization, but fastens with hook-and-loop tape for stable wear.

Propet is a rapidly growing shoe company dedicated to making the worlds best walking shoes. Propet shoes are better walking shoes because they're designed and manufactured to be your most comfortable walking experience ever. Extra attention is paid to giving your foot support where it is needed, more cushy comfort where it counts and more room where your foot's moving parts need freedom when walking. The result has to be tried to be believed! Shouldn't you be wearing the world's best walking shoes?
feature_bullets: A comfort sandal that you can wear confidently all day long.
Open-toe walking shoe features a full grain leather or nubuck upper.
Dual hook-and-loop straps for an adjustable fit.

Leather lining. Closed heel. Durable polyurethane outsole offers traction for a sure step. Logo on strap closest to ankle. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 9 oz Product measurements were taken using size 6.5, width XX (4E). Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
